|twitter = https://twitter.com/richardbrake}}'''Richard Brake''' (born 30 November 1964) is a British-American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Joe Chill, the murderer of Bruce Wayne's parents, in ''Batman Begins''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the [[White Walkers' master]].
